result.title: What's happening with acm.mipt.ru?
result.content: There's this nice online judge http://acm.mipt.ru/judge that contains some important classic problems like Hard life. It's still running but looks like it was forsaken for years, because it doesn't even support C++11. I was going to submit some problems there, but I'm too used to new C++ features. Is there somebody from MIPT who can update the compilers? Thank you.
